title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1324/97 of 9 July 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 1325/96 establishing the supply balance for the Canary Islands in the rice products sector, and laying down detailed rules for the adjustment of aid for products coming from the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1324/97 of 9 July 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 1325/96 establishing the supply balance for the Canary Islands in the rice products sector, and laying down detailed rules for the adjustment of aid for products coming from the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission

SUPPLY BALANCE FOR RICE FOR THE CANARY ISLANDS FOR THE MARKETING PERIOD 1 JULY 1996 TO 30 JUNE 1997
